# respond(error:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an error when the system fails to load the value.

## Declaration

```swift
func respond(error: any Error)
```

## Parameters

- **error**: The error to return for the request.

## Handling the response

- **respond(value:)**: Returns the metadata item’s value.
- **metadataItem**: The metadata item to request a value for.

items.description: The metadata item to request a value for.
items.name: metadataItem
